overview:
As President & CEO, Dave has extensive experience in all areas of business from executive management to strategic planning, marketing and sales. His vision, leadership, and business acumen are all crucial to the company’s success. Dave oversees all marketing, creative, and professional services. He also directly manages several client accounts.

Prior to HighTouch, Dave served as President and CEO of Interlogic Graphics and Marketing, Inc (ILGM), a provider of content management solutions. At ILGM, Dave was in charge of all creative, managerial, marketing, financial and operational management of the company. He has also worked for MCI WorldcomÂ® as a software project manager, M2 Technologies as a software product sales engineer and in operations management for International Conference Resorts of America (now Benchmark Hospitality International).
